channel.title: [463] Big modifications?
channel.description: Well, my menu hooks broke, and it seems they changed the menu system? Does anyone have more info on this?

item.title: [463] Big modifications?
item.dc:creator: @pplsuqbawlz pplsuqbawlz
item.description:
@pplsuqbawlz wrote:

[quote=“White Castle, post:13, topic:121316”]http://java.sun.com/docs/books/jvms/second_edition/html/ClassFile.doc.html#1169

Signature is retard shorthand for Descriptor.[/quote][quote=“newbiehacker, post:14, topic:121316”]Although it should really be renamed seeing as JDK 6 introduced the signature attribute[/quote]

Type, actually, works fine in both, and is a much better shorthand.

Read full topic

item.title: [463] Big modifications?
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

i can probably help you out. Oh, and does anyone know the field names for Menus? I’ve successfully localized the class (ee) and i think i know the fields, Not 100% sure they are correct though. The return value has changed in the method (a) from byte to int, and some new fields are in there. Anyways, here’s my output on the menu fields in that class:

getMenuOptionsCount injected -> ld.n getMenuHeight injected -> ja.k getMenuWidth injected -> aa.p getMenuX injected -> od.s getMenuY injected -> cb.j

Read full topic

item.description:

ummm, a few graphic updates, not too much. more interfaces. that’s about it. hey Speljohan, can u help me with my 463?

Read full topic

item.title: [463] Big modifications?
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:5, topic:121316”]They added 3 new class files though.

EDIT:
Would you be ever so kind to post a complete dump, including camera? You see, some of my bad hooks broke, and i am truthfully the dumbest person in the world when it comes to identifying new fields. The only thing i can do is hook them.[/quote]

[code]–running update.Camera –
getGroundByteArray() into class client gets STATIC byte[][][] rf.E
getCameraZ() into class client gets STATIC int od.o
getCameraX() into class client gets STATIC int ua.p
getCameraY() into class client gets STATIC int sc.o
update.Camera sucessfully completed 4 hooks, took 0ms

–running update.CameraCurve –
getCameraCurveX() into class client gets STATIC int ja.b
getCameraCurveY() into class client gets STATIC int ke.n
update.CameraCurve sucessfully completed 2 hooks, took 6ms[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: [463] Big modifications?

item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

frank_, i am aware of the, but since i began with bytecode stuff (459), it’s always been 156 classes, and now it’s suddenly 159.

Read full topic

item.title: [463] Big modifications?
item.dc:creator: @frank frank_
item.description:
@frank wrote:

i honestly wouldnt use class count as any gauge on how much changes, they tend to have a zillion static items which can be thrown around wherever

Read full topic

item.title: [463] Big modifications?
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

They added 3 new class files though.

EDIT:
Would you be ever so kind to post a complete dump, including camera? You see, some of my bad hooks broke, and i am truthfully the dumbest person in the world when it comes to identifying new fields. The only thing i can do is hook them.

Read full topic

item.title: [463] Big modifications?
item.dc:creator: @Silver_Lining Silver Lining
item.description:
@Silver_Lining wrote:

Not too many modifications, one of my RSInterface hooks broke, but it had nothing to do with the update, but just unreliable hooks. I fixed it. My Item hooks are broken too, but again, the result of lazy hooking.Added method loopCycleStatus() to class ef. Returns ef.ub. Field signature: I Added method height() to class ef. Returns ef.Ic. Field signature: I Added method anim() to class ef. Returns ef.lb. Field signature: I Added method smallX() to class ef. Returns ef.Gb. Field signature: [I Added method x() to class ef. Returns ef.Xb. Field signature: I Added method y() to class ef. Returns ef.Hb. Field signature: I Added method smallY() to class ef. Returns ef.Gb. Field signature: [I Added method message() to class ef. Returns ef.oc. Field signature: Lid; Injected 8/8 entity methods into ef in 172 milliseconds. Added method bytes() to class id. Returns id.o. Field signature: [B Injected 1/1 RSString methods into id in 0 milliseconds. Added method def() to class hd. Returns hd.Rc. Field signature: Lwa; Added method name() to class a. Returns a.kd. Field signature: Lid; Added method model() to class a. Returns a.pd. Field signature: Lka; Added method pkHeadIcon() to class a. Returns a.bd. Field signature: I Added method prayerHeadIcon() to class a. Returns a.Tc. Field signature: I Added method team() to class a. Returns a.Tc. Field signature: I Added method combatLevel() to class a. Returns a.cd. Field signature: I Injected 7/7 methods into player and npc in 31 milliseconds. Added method id() to class wa. Returns wa.eb. Field signature: I Added method name() to class wa. Returns wa.U. Field signature: Lid; Added method actions() to class wa. Returns wa.pb. Field signature: [Lid; Injected 3/3 npcdef methods into wa in 15 milliseconds. Added method modelHeight() to class ha. Returns ha.S. Field signature: I Injected 1/1 animable methods into class ha in 0 milliseconds. Added method inventory() to class fd. Returns fd.Ic. Field signature: [I Added method inventoryStackSizes() to class fd. Returns fd.Ab. Field signature: [I Added method type() to class fd. Returns fd.w. Field signature: I Added method atActionType() to class fd. Returns fd.Ob. Field signature: I Added method width() to class fd. Returns fd.tc. Field signature: I Added method height() to class fd. Returns fd.Vb. Field signature: I Added method actions() to class fd. Returns fd.xb. Field signature: [Lid; Added method message() to class fd. Returns fd.dd. Field signature: [I Added method selectedActionName() to class fd. Returns fd.Fb. Field signature: Lid; Added method spellName() to class fd. Returns fd.uc. Field signature: Lid; Added method tooltip() to class fd. Returns fd.D. Field signature: Lid; Injected 11/11 interface methods into class fd in 79 milliseconds. Added method id() to class ka. Returns ka.sb. Field signature: I Added method stackSize() to class ka. Returns ka.Gb. Field signature: I Injected 2/2 item methods into ka in 0 milliseconds. Added method prev() to class sc. Returns sc.d. Field signature: Lsc; Added method next() to class sc. Returns sc.b. Field signature: Lsc; Added method nodeID() to class sc. Returns sc.m. Field signature: J Injected 3/3 node hooks into sc in 15 milliseconds. Added method prev() to class eb. Returns eb.y. Field signature: Leb; Added method next() to class eb. Returns eb.N. Field signature: Leb; Injected 2/2 nodesub hooks into eb in 0 milliseconds.EDIT: Fixed the item hooks and added Node/NodeSub hooks.

Read full topic

item.title: [463] Big modifications?
item.dc:creator: @mage_owner mage_owner
item.description:
@mage_owner wrote:

Well i know that on the equipment tab there is a new button that tells you which 3 items you will keep if you were to die, along with the equipment stats button. It looks like it shouldn’t be that complicated to figure out though. It calculates which 3 items you will keep, which items you will lose, and it factors in if you are skulled, and if you have protect item on.

Read full topic
